name: Master Mind (YourBest_Nightmare, zsmith25, wschaeff, twarre12, TerraMarie)
name_original: Master Mind (YourBest_Nightmare, zsmith25, wschaeff, twarre12, TerraMarie)
description:
You play as Kalem Wright, a man suffering from a traumatic past, undergoing his psychiatrist's special "treatment" that requires entering his own mind and relocating the imbalanced chemicals physically. Except Dr. Hughes has other plans for you...

This FPS Psychological Thriller takes you on a journey through the left and right brain of a troubled man, fending off the nightmares, hallucinations, hatred, and depression he experiences and gaining back control of his own mind.

INSTRUCTIONS FOR DOWNLOAD:

  1. The link below will take you to a google drive. The folder you will see is called "MasterMind Full.rar". 
  2. Select the folder named "Mastermind Full.rar," and then download it entirely. 
  3. Once downloaded to your computer, open the folder, select the file called MasterMind.exe. and then open.
